Prev: Crew up to bat Up: Hot Shots vs Blue Crew Next: Sara at bat

Overthrow



Instead of stopping play, one of the Hot Shots threw the ball home after the runner and let another score through on the error.
Taken Monday, March 15, 2004, 06:39:25pm.  Original image size: 3072x2048, 7.2Mb
Technical details: Canon EOS D60, 1/50s @ F2.8, ISO 800, 28mm/F2.8 (45mm equiv)
PS7 CRW -0.15:0:50:60:3:25:25+M, Crop
